You made the picture, or did you find it? Because I like the idea.
Find xD
I don't see how we can connect Rammus with bees. Except for his ult that can be a swarm of bees. But that's not enough imho.

> [{quoted}](name=Trias000,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=BoZJBEr4,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-12-03T20:04:54.056+0000)
>
> I don't see how we can connect Rammus with bees. Except for his ult that can be a swarm of bees. But that's not enough imho.

This gave me an idea for a Bee Keeper Fiddlesticks... Swarm of bees on their face for his Q, throw a bouncing bee for his E instead of a crow, swarm of bees for his ult... The only issue would be his W, maybe just make him succ honey out of his enemies? pollen? ehhh...
well if we use that logic with every ramus skin he wouldn't get any since he has bland visuals in general

> [{quoted}](name=CasterGilgamesh,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=BoZJBEr4,comment-id=00090002,timestamp=2018-12-04T15:09:00.114+0000)
>
> well if we use that logic with every ramus skin he wouldn't get any since he has bland visuals in general

Well, for instance, he can be [a murderous tire](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1612774/), who can drift supper hard and create tons of damaging smoke around it (R).
well, a lot of their skins are just kind of there and that's fine
It's perfect, now we just need it to bee real.
